faq.question: What is the bond for?
faq.answer: The bond is required as a security deposit and is refunded when the service is complete.

faq.question: Why do I have to pay a service fee?
faq.answer: The service fee covers the costs of diagnosis, repair, and maintenance of your device.

faq.question: Do I need a charger with my courtesy phone?
faq.answer: A charger is not mandatory, but you may request one when using a courtesy phone.
